title: What are some ideas to include in a tech blog? - Quora

response.answer_text: A technology blog has different sub categories to handle. You can include product reviewsgeneral news articles covering launch of latest gadgetsPublishing interviews of famous personalities that relates to tech sectorYou can also publish some tips and tricks, Step-by-step Guides etc. These are just some basic ideas to begin with. Once you are into the writing, you automatically will get the idea of how to search for a topic.Be Wise and then RISE Regards.

Start a blog! For example if your really interested computer science and anything related to tech, start a tech blog. The success of your blog depends on way of presentation of the topic and the way you describe your thoughts and ideas regarding a particular innovative idea. For that, Pick a topic which your passionate about , For example if your passionate and like expressing your thoughts about programming, Start a tech blog! A techblog should have latest technology newsprogramming tips and tricks“how to” and “why” articlesmainly advice for programmersnew gadget reviewsthese are the most common and most relevant when compared to the top techblogs like techcruch etc I hit 2 two birds with one stone,I look for a good and well informed question on my quora feed which is related topic to my personal technology blog.I then post that answer on my blog,Advantages:+1 Post for my blog+1 answer for my quora account and helping someone with an answer. I write about programming and technology,If you follow me I won’t waste your time.
